#
# Autogenerated from /export/home/dicuccio/cpp-cmake/cpp-cmake.2015-01-24/src/dbapi/driver/ftds64/freetds/tds/Makefile.tds64.lib
#
add_library(tds_ftds64
    challenge config convert data des getmac iconv locale login md4 md5 mem
    net numeric query read tdsstring threadsafe token util vstrbuild write
    tds_checks replacements hmac_md5 gssapi sspi
)
include_directories(${KRB5_INCLUDE} ${FTDS64_INCLUDE})

add_definitions(-D_FREETDS_LIBRARY_SOURCE -DHAVE_CONFIG_H=1)

target_link_libraries(tds_ftds64
    ${KRB5_LIBS}
)

if (APPLE)
   target_link_libraries(tds_ftds64 -Wl,-framework,ApplicationServices -liconv)
endif (APPLE)
